entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023
